sentences.english: To explain the current tense physician-patient relationship is an exigent social problem.
sentences.chinese: 解读目前紧张的医患关系是一个迫切的社会课题。

sentences.english: Informed consent is the most basic and key right of patients.
sentences.chinese: 患者知情同意权是医患关系中最基础和最核心的权利。

sentences.english: The matey relation between the doctors and patients has active effect on preventing medical disputes.
sentences.chinese: 融洽的医患关系对防范医疗纠纷起着积极的作用。

sentences.english: Doctor-patient relationship has become a pain spot of whole society in recent several years.
sentences.chinese: 近几年，医患关系成为整个社会的痛点。

sentences.english: In recent years, physician-patient relationship has becoming very nervous in our country.
sentences.chinese: 近年来医患关系紧张成了一个社会热点问题。

sentences.english: The doctor-patient relationship is based on trust.
sentences.chinese: 医患关系以信任为基础。

sentences.english: It's of great importance to construct Doctor-patient Communication and make it a compulsory course for medical education.
sentences.chinese: 在高等医学教育中开设医患沟通学必修课程意义重大。

sentences.english: In recent years, the doctor-patient relationship is turning into social hot spot gradually.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，医患关系逐渐成为社会的一大热点。

sentences.english: By mainly exploring causes and effects about media involving in physician-patient disputes.
sentences.chinese: 探讨传媒介入医患纠纷的原因及作用。

sentences.english: The ancient doctor-patient relationship changes following the whirligig of time and society.
sentences.chinese: 古代医患关系因时代与社会的变迁而有所改变。

sentences.english: We believe with the promotion of medical ethics, the relationship between doctors and patients will become more harmonious.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信随着医德的提升，医患关系将变得更加和谐。

sentences.english: Currently medical dispute is in an increasing tendency and the doctor-patient conflict aggravates in China.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段我国的医患纠纷日益增多，医患矛盾尖锐。

sentences.english: Currently medical dispute is in an increasing tendency and the doctor-patient conflict aggravates in China.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段我国的医患纠纷日益增多，医患矛盾尖锐。

sentences.english: It could damage the patient-doctor relationship.
sentences.chinese: 这或许会破坏医患之间的关系。

sentences.english: Communication without language plays a key role in the communication between the doctors and patients.
sentences.chinese: 而非语言性沟通在医患沟通中发挥着非常重要的作用。

sentences.english: That is a part of the special joy of a psychotherapy relationship.
sentences.chinese: 这也是心理治疗中医患关系最有乐趣的一点。

definition: Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed
a friend made in hospital or people who become friends in hospital/wardmate
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
"drugs serving to nourish doctors", perceived problem in PRC medical practice
